rows.label: tev011901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev011901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Dirk about the new crew member.

rows.label: tev011901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev011901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Dirk if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Dirk about the new crew member.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Dirk about Soul Voices.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Dirk about indigens.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Dirk about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Dirk about indigens.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Dirk about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011901_SEL2031
rows.name: Ask Dirk about recent developments.

rows.label: tev011901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Yeah, I heard that Elma finally discovered a new crew
member on one of her search missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG0002
rows.name:
I wonder what happened to that survivor?
I'm guessing [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] probably became a BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG0003
rows.name:
Maybe I'll run into [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] one day.
It would be great if we hit it off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG0004
rows.name:
The rest of my team is all seasoned veterans,
so it would be nice to have a chance to talk with
a fellow new recruit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG0005
rows.name:
Not that I'm complaining, mind you.
Experienced BLADEs like Phina have
a lot of great advice to throw my way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00010
rows.name:
I gotta admit, I have a terrible sense of direction.
I'm always getting lost on bounty missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00011
rows.name:
Adelbert—that's the leader of my team, Team Jaeger—
gave me a good piece of advice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00012
rows.name:
He said, "When you get lost, look for the trail.
Following the footprints of one who came before
is a sure path to finding your way home."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00013
rows.name: Yeah, that Adelbert's a really impressive guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00014
rows.name:
Problem is, when I was following the trail back to
New LA, I ended up way out west in Noctilum![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00015
rows.name:
It caused a lot of trouble for my team. Aaaaagain.
There has to be a better way to stay on track.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00020
rows.name:
I've heard a lot about that new BLADE lately.
I think [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] name is [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00021
rows.name: They say [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] killed a tyrant on [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] very first mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00022
rows.name:
That's incredible. I mean, I'm a Harrier and all,
but tyrants are way out of my league.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00023
rows.name:
Heck, I can barely handle the ovis that roam
around here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00024
rows.name:
It's pathetic that I have to ask someone newer than
me for advice, but I sure wish that new BLADE would
teach me [ST:gender p1=his p2=her ] combat secrets![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00029
rows.name:
Phina taught me to listen carefully to my companions'
voices in battle and approach foes accordingly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00030
rows.name:
She said that would let me fight with greater strength
than usual, and that it would even help me get back
on my feet after I've taken a beating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00031
rows.name:
I still have trouble paying attention to the voices
around me when I'm focused on fighting the enemy
in front of me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG00032
rows.name:
But I hope I'll learn how to turn their voices into power
and start bringing down tyrants soon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1001
rows.name:
Some indigens are so indiscriminately violent,
they'll even attack other indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1002
rows.name:
Adelbert was really smart about using them to attack
and weaken our bounty targets.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1003
rows.name:
He was really an incredible guy. I don't know that
there's anyone you'd have wanted by your side more
when battling a dangerous foe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1009
rows.name: Phina's finally managed to calm down a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1010
rows.name: But she still has nightmares every night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1011
rows.name:
I suppose that's to be expected. I don't care how strong
you are—nobody can watch a friend get killed before
their eyes and not have it affect them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1012
rows.name: The wound in her heart may never heal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1013
rows.name: I'd trade my own life to save her if I could.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1020
rows.name:
I've heard rumors about indigens that can control
the weather. You probably have too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1021
rows.name:
I know there are indigens that become unbelievably
strong in specific weather conditions, but controlling it?
No thanks, mister![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1022
rows.name:
Anyway, if you allow them to engage you in their
preferred environmental conditions, you are in for a
world of pain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1023
rows.name:
So always pay attention to the weather when battling
an unfamiliar enemy. Your life could depend on it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1030
rows.name:
Some monsters are so violent once they're enraged,
they won't calm down until they've obliterated
everything around them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1031
rows.name:
Everyone in Team Jaeger knew to battle such foes
with extremely rapid attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1032
rows.name:
Adelbert would charge in and strike the beast's belly,
while Grette and Phina backed him up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1033
rows.name:
They'd bring the creature down without giving it time to
mount a counterattack, much less become enraged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG1034
rows.name:
Yeah, they fought like a well-oiled machine.
Even after what happened, I'm proud to have
been a part of that team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2001
rows.name:
Corwin invited me to do some missions with his team
the other day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2002
rows.name:
After what happened to my old team, I was ready to
quit BLADE entirely. It was nice to know there was still
someone who wanted to work with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2003
rows.name:
But I had to turn him down. I don't think I could bear
to go through that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2004
rows.name: And besides, my place is here now. ...Protecting Phina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2009
rows.name: I heard that Corwin was killed in the line of duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2010
rows.name:
Pathfinders like him were the tip of the spear in terms
of opening up Mira to human activity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2011
rows.name:
Without those kind of people around,
what's going to become of BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011901_MSG2012
rows.name: Will we even be able to survive on this damn planet?[ST:wait ]
